title: Expression builder displays old column names instead of aliases from dataset
description: When setting aliases for columns in a dataset, the expression builder still displays the old column names instead of the new aliases when selecting the dataset.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are shown instead of the newly set aliases for the columns.
EB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the aliases should be displayed instead of the old column names.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset, for example, set it to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and try to select the dataset. Check if the aliases are displayed for the columns instead of the old column names.
